altTitles.th: คุณหมายอดนักสืบ

description.en: Wajima Takeru loves dogs and when he goes to the pound to pick up a new dog, he catches the eye of one particular dog that, according to the workers, doesn’t interact or play. It turns out that the most famous detective in history, Sherlock Holmes, has been reincarnated as this dog that Takeru names Sherdock (Sherlock + Dog). Only Takeru can hear his voice, but his mind is just as brilliant as ever. With the help of Takeru, who fills in the role of Watson, Sherdock uses his incredible observation and deduction skills to solve crimes around the city.

biography.en:
樹林伸 (Shin Kibayashi)

Agi Tadashi ( (亜樹直) shared with his older sister, Yuko Kibayashi (樹林ゆう子), non-fiction writer.
Seimaru Amagi (天樹征丸)
Yuma Ando (安童夕馬)
Yuya Aoki (青樹佑夜)
Joji Arimori (有森丈時)
Hiroaki Igano (伊賀大晃)
Ryo Ryumon (龍門諒)
S.K.

**Associated names:**
さとうゆうき

Not to be confused with [Satou Yuuki (さとうユーキ)](https://mangadex.org/author/e1498b66-d029-47e3-a87b-2485ec7f9d6a) or [Satou Yuuki (佐藤祐紀)](https://mangadex.org/author/dc21a571-7b70-4927-87be-215aab4216fd).

Debut: August 2001 'Magazine FRESH' with 『淘汰ーThe Death』
Prizes: 66th Newcomers Manga Awards・入選受賞
Hobby: Losing weight
Special skill: Gaining weight 

Previously worked as an assistant under Yasuda Tsuyoshi and Megumi Kouji.

Isayama Hajime and Ueno Haruki were her assistants.
